Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Central Park. Service is resuming allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks near Central Park. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
